AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: individual being questioned by Agent Pena, passenger in the tractor-trailer, attempted to pull down the fold-up bed, charged with conspiracy to transport aliens within the United States, filed a motion to dismiss the indictment on speedy trial grounds, sentenced to 41 months' imprisonment, argues about the lawfulness of Agent Pena's immigration questions, claimed to have a possessory interest in the tractor-trailer, appellant in the case
